column5: We're going to be plowing all day for one just like it.  :-)  Howard does it again and that's not his biggest.
WOW....thats a monster musky for sure,a fish of a lifetime
Wow!    Mike
fat fat fish!  Cheers!
Wow
GADZUKES!!
Holy Joey
WOW...that's a biggun!!!
That is one awesome fish!!
Yesssirie........that is one pig of a fish! Had that e-mailed me from the NAFC just monday I think..thought the guy looked familiar. Thanks for sharring that with us Bud! Peter
Now thats a fish....His instincs are bang on I'd say!
Tom (or anybody  ), do you happen to know what a "plow" lure looks like that was mentioned in the article ?
Only plows I know are on the front of pickup trucks and municipal vehicles, lol. I'm sure someone will be of help.
Thats is huge
14" (plus lip) of shoal pounding beauty.
Raf, I could use that thing to shovel my stairs if I filed the lip flat.
The baits are definately diggers Tom.
Raf, who would carry those around here.... JB's ??
Yes.  It will set ya back at least $80 CDN.  Make sure your rod, reel, terminal tackle are up to the task and that you have something that will cut through the 8/0 trebles.
Don't tell the wife..... and take your bank manager....
I see buddy is sitting down!
I thought a 10" beleiver was heavy trolling,   Wow.  Thanks Raf.    No kidding
You know you want one.
Kinda like the Lays potato chip commercial though...  You know you can't stop at just one.....
I seem to remember taking a shot at you about a year ago on that very subject, lol.
What are you talking about Tom?    That Muskie is a MONSTER BTW.
wouldn't want to be swimming in his waters, or atleast not my dog anyway...
